actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 relating to airport site selection.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to disapprove any airport development project with respect to any proposed airport site unless such airport has been approved by the community or communities to be served by such airport.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 relating to airport site selection.
